title: Emmerdale spoilers: Robert hands himself in to the police leaving Aaron devastated
text:
Robert Sugden (Ryan Hawley) was forced to go on the run with Aaron Dingle (Danny Miller) in Emmerdale when he learned that rapist Lee Posner had died in hospital. However, tonight a shock twist ensued as an emotional Robert handed himself in to the police — an act which left Aaron devastated.

An emotional Victoria was forced to inform Robert that rapist Lee had died earlier this week. The revelation understandably left Robert devastated, as it meant he could be charged with murder. Unwilling to let this happen, Liv (Isobel Steele) suggested that both he and Aaron should go on the run together — and the pair ultimately agreed to do just that.

Last night, Liv tracked down her sibling and made it clear that she wanted to head off with them when they departed. In tonight’s episode, Aaron desperately tried to change Liv’s mind and, eventually he succeeded. However, it was clear that Robert could see what this whole situation was doing to both Liv and Aaron.

Meanwhile, Mandy (Lisa Riley) eventually caved and spilled the beans on Liv’s location to a worried Chas (Lucy Pargeter), Paddy (Dominic Brunt) and Diane (Elizabeth Estenson) and, as a result, they set off to the cottage to locate her.

However, unbeknown to the them, DS Wise (Neil Roberts) was in pursuit. Upon discovering the cop car tailing them, Paddy pulled over, and attempted to distract the detective by insisting that Chas was having pregnancy pains and thus they were in a rush, but it ultimately proved fruitless, as DS Wise worked out where they were headed via their Sat Nav.

Chas and Paddy caught up with Aaron, but as they informed him of what was happening, Robert discreetly turned himself in to the police — and they arrested him on suspicion of murder.

Upon realising what Robert had done, Aaron was devastated, but Paddy held him tightly, preventing him from going to his husband.

It became clear that Robert had done this for his husband — to save him from having to spend his life on the run away from his family.

The episode came to a close as an emotional Robert was put in the police vehicle.

Is this the end of the road for Robert?

Will he serve life in prison?

Emmerdale continues on Friday 18th October at 7pm on ITV.

description: Robert made a life-changing sacrifice for the man that he loves — but it's one that left Aaron heartbroken.
